items.content_html: This project is built with **Ollama** and **TinyLlama** to create a lightweight Large Language Model (LLM) application. The backend, powered by Express.js, processes requests and communicates with the TinyLlama model, while the frontend, developed in React.js, provides a user-friendly interface for interaction.
items.title: zidniryi/LLM-GPT-Like-Tiny: This project is built with **Ollama** and **TinyLlama** to create a lightweight Large Language Model (LLM) application. The backend, powered by Express.js, processes requests and communicates with the TinyLlama model, while the frontend, developed in React.js, provides a user-friendly interface for interaction.
